website_summaries.verdict: A quality CC cream that is safe for sensitive skin.
pros: Covers redness and fine lines to leave skin looking even and smooth
Doesn’t run or smear when you’re sweating
Lightweight formula lets your skin breathe
Cream is cruelty-free, gentle on sensitive skin and contains SPF 30
cons: Strong scent does not appeal to all people

website_summaries.verdict: Enhances a variety of skin concerns and is easy on the wallet.
pros: Contains pigments that improve various color and tone imperfections
Goes on smoothly and feels lightweight and comfortable on the face
Users love how it doesn't have the tendency to settle in fine lines
cons: Those with very light skin tones may find the color too dark
Scent is on the strong side

customer_reviews.title: Blurs lines and wrinkles with a nice color correction
customer_reviews.text: I have tried more expensive primers and they don't work as well as this one! Blurs lines and wrinkles with a nice color correction. I have spent three times as much at a large cosmetic store (the ones with black and white bags) and this is by far my favorite
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Gibson

customer_reviews.title: and hate wearing makeup
customer_reviews.text: I live in a humid climate, and hate wearing makeup, so I had been in the market for a matte finish light cc cream, this one fits the bill. So far I have not had any adverse reactions. As with any sunscreen if you want actual sun protection you should reapply. I generally do before lunch. I like how soft my skin feels with the product. I am happy I gave it a chance. It works great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Gabbie

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty basic. I am not a fan of the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to every day makeup. It's pretty basic. I am not a fan of the concealing stick as it is almost transparent, but it works on most days when I have pretty clear skin. This isn't fancy- it's my "I'm not wearing makeup" look. I love physician's formula because of their commitment to making products without a bunch of cancer-causing chemicals. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Bee Money

customer_reviews.title: Does a decent job for light redness.
customer_reviews.text: The product does a decent job of covering light redness but leaves your skin looking drab thus requiring a blush or something to brighten things up. Mature women might want to use a moisturizer before applying this as the product is not very moist and dry skin soaks it up making it hard to blend over red areas. I do like that the product is not tested on animals.
customer_reviews.author: MaryB

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful cc cream/Awful fragrance
customer_reviews.text: Very natural coverage. It makes my skin look healthier. It doesn’t settle in my fine lines like other foundations. It’s not heavy enough to blur sun discoloration so you will need a little extra concealer to help that out It’s only flaw is that it has a VERY strong unpleasant odor. If they could fix that I would be sold 100%
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: My favorite foundation ❤
customer_reviews.text: This has been my GO TO foundation for a few years now!! It really is a great product. It covers any imperfections and blends in excellently well with my fair skin tone. I couldn't find this product for a while (they disappeared off the shelves inside stores), so I tried several different, more expensive foundations during that time and they just weren't cutting it like this one! I was so relieved when I happened to search for it on here and found it! AND to be this low of a price?!?!! Anyway -- highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST I COULD FIND FOR THE MONEY TO COVER HUGE PIMPLES
customer_reviews.text: i'm a very young looking 44 year old whose skin decided it was time for puberty again. i tried every kind of foundation and powder combo i could find without spending a celebrity fortune. my skin has cleared up now THANK GOD! but at the time i had these huge thumb sized red pimples that i couldn't cover very well with anything i tried. but this stuff was by far the best i could find for what i was willing to spend. i didn't need the concealer so much bc the foundation and powder worked well together. i will probably continue with this brand and combination
customer_reviews.author: HEATHER WILLIAMS

customer_reviews.title: Sheer, smelly
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a comparable cc cream from the aveeno that was discontinued in fair/light and am very disappointed. The aveeno is lightly tinted and just evens things out, less than a foundation but more than sheer and this seems totally sheer. Worst though, this smells funky and it doesn’t fade within a few moments.
customer_reviews.author: Hef

customer_reviews.title: The powder was everywhere!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the CC cream and have used it for some time. When my local store quit selling it, I was so happy to find it here on Amazon. I ordered this set thinking it would be a better value and was excited to try out the powder. When I opened the shipment, powder was everywhere. I am so disappointed...and what a mess!!! In addition, my order is non-returnable. What a pricey empty compact!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fresh looking coverage for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Nice, natural looking coverage for a great price. I have sensitive, oily skin and this set does quite well compared to much pricier options. I do need to use blotting paper after a few hours but it doesn't look too lived-in afterwards. Even just the compact on its own makes a nice, lightweight layer but I will say that the enclosed brush is a little rude on the skin, but for the price point I can live with it. Overall, I'm a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Jo

customer_reviews.title: only mineral SPF primer on the market
customer_reviews.text: This is the only mineral SPF primer on the market to date. You should be wearing a SPF everyday anyways, but now, for an affordable price you get primer and some coverage, too. What's not to love? The only thing is that light/med is still too dark for fair skin! There should be fair shade for very pale skin. The coverage isn't much, which makes this very fool-proof, since it's just more like a tinted primer SPF than a CC cream, which i like.
customer_reviews.author: minimalist shopper

customer_reviews.title: Color is way off!
customer_reviews.text: If you are light/ivory/bisque this will be way too dark for you. This color is more suitable for a medium beige/beige colored skin. I thought I could mix it with a lighter color I own (alabaster) but it’s so orangey it doesn’t look good no matter what. Not worth the cheap price because it looks cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Still

customer_reviews.title: Want to love it
customer_reviews.text: I really want to love this product in fact I’m on my second bottle. Pros: It makes my skin look smooth and even toned which is awesome it goes on really easy no streaks or anything. Cons: It’s super greasy, almost like it’s oil based on this second bottle I stopped using it all together, I don’t know if the formula was changed along the way or what but it makes my face feel really gross like I’ve been standing over a deep fryer all day. More than two consecutive days of use results in break outs. 🤷‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best makeup I've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE. I have gotten SOOOO many compliments on how clear, pure, smooth and even colored my face looks since I started using this makeup! It's light and a pleasure to wear and apply. Covers very well without looking thick. I'm fair skinned with some red areas on my skin. I have not gotten a single blemish from this makeup, which is the true test. WILL DEF ORDER AGAIN....SOON. haha
customer_reviews.author: Amazing

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have combination skin and in the summer it oily and I have a tendency to sweat a lot. This gives me nice coverage & evens out my skin tone. It allows me to be able to wear make up in the summertime without being too heavy, even when its extremely humid out. It also has a 30spf built in which is a bonus because sunscreen generally makes me break out on my face. I have NO problems with breakouts with this product. I just love it!
customer_reviews.author: wckdwanda

customer_reviews.title: Simple, natural, and polished!
customer_reviews.text: This make up is efficient for those who don't want to be fumbling around with multiple products to get a quick polished look. It's very simple to get the desired coverage in 3 steps and the box explains how to effectively cover trouble spots like tired eyes and redness as well as highlight your better features. Overall, with some mascara or any other little touches you may want to add this is a very easy great natural look that you can easily dress up or down as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Case

customer_reviews.title: Good product but weird colors
customer_reviews.text: The liquid is way to dark (and I mean like 3 shades too dark) and the powder is bright white, so when I use these products I have to make sure to use both at the same time or else I end up looking like I have a fake tan face or I'm a ghost. The concealer works well.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall

customer_reviews.title: I love Physcians Formula!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value for the items included in this set. I only use Physicians Formula make-up, it is great for covering blemishes, and other skin issues you may have.. I use the green concealer under my foundation and power and it covers my port-wine stain completely. It is not harsh on the skin and is easy to remove.
customer_reviews.author: MullP

customer_reviews.title: Smells terrible
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty good coverage, with setting spray it will last a while but it did feel pretty thick on my skin and had a strange oily surface. My skin looked goodthough, and it didnt dry it out. But I used it only twice and prob wont again because I honestly just cant get past the smell of the product. It's hard to explain the scent, but it was pretty awful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage; limited moisturizer; probably good for oily skin but not for normal/dry skin.
customer_reviews.text: Used as a replacement for Aveeno CC Tinted SPF 30 that was discontinued which was my favorite. The price point for the product is good. The SPF is 30 and that is good. The problem I had is that is it not as moisturizing as Aveeno but is a great alternative and I do recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: James C. Bingham

customer_reviews.title: Not Full Coverage, Nice Light Cover
customer_reviews.text: This makeup is good for a light cover. Because it said ‘blur’ I thought it would have a thicker coverage. I did like the feel of it, the consistency, but it has a strange smell. Nothing bad, just different. I actually preferred this company’s other foundation called Super CC Creme for more solid coverage.
customer_reviews.author: MCK

customer_reviews.title: This one works!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I have very red skin tone and this works well to cover it. I don't use the concealer every day because the foundation and powder together do a good job of covering. When I do use it for one of those sneaky pimples it works really well. It's not overly oily feeling after a long day. It wears well throughout the day, it's not all worn off when I get home at night. All in all, I'm sold on this product. And I've tried a lot of products over the years!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Color Corrector
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a color corrector to go under my Bare Minerals make-up. I have really red splotches on my face in the mornings. This works really well and is so smooth going on. I used to buy it at Walmart but they don't carry it anymore so I was so excited to find it on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Has a smell, and too dark for fair skin
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the only over CC cream I've used, from it cosmetics, this stuff is OK. It's got an interesting texture, and it leaves my skin feeling a little dry. It definitely has a smell that fades after it dries. My biggest issue is that it's a lot darker for my skin than I need it to be. I have very fair skin, so having a fair foundation or skin cream is really important because it just shows up orange. If they made this in a couple shades lighter than the one I got I'd like it a lot more.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: This make- up set is TOO dark and creases a LOT
customer_reviews.text: This make-up set is suitable for age groups 16-20 year olds only...... The colour they say on the packaging light/medium IT'S NOT TRUE...it's actually dark!!! And it creases SO much!!! Well what do you expect for such a cheap price.!!! I will use the powder I'm fine with that. And then i will use the concealer when I get more tanned.
customer_reviews.author: Anda

customer_reviews.title: It covers great but if you have large pores it sticks in ...
customer_reviews.text: It covers great but if you have large pores it sticks in your pores and doesn't dissolve. I think it's a good concealer, but not a good if you have pores
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: The perfect light coverage!
customer_reviews.text: I had physician formula sold CC cream and was a little bummed that they changed it at first. But after using this I'm so glad they did. Adding the primer in makes this glide on so smooth and really blurs any imperfections. The coverage is still nice and light I don't feel cakey and it doesn't feel heavy. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: I like this item and will probably purchase again. I was looking for a little more coverage like Tarte so I mixed a bit of foundation with this & it seemed to work well. Pls note that I am a senior, so need a bit of 'extra'. If you are younger this will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Zivah

customer_reviews.title: Covers all of my imperfections!
customer_reviews.text: I love all of PF.s Cc products. I had been searching for a concealer to cover broken capillaries, brown spots, red spots and dark circles. The concealer covers all of these imperfections. The Cc cream should be used sparingly but it does even out the skin tone. The powder I love because it lasts all day long to make sure I have full natural looking coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Thinking Woman

customer_reviews.title: matches my skin, great product
customer_reviews.text: over all great product and quality. the concealer could be a bit more lighter because i use it for the under eye, but i guess it matches the CC cream perfectly. my only issue is that after a while it start accentuate the fine lines as it settles over the day; however def worth the price !
customer_reviews.author: Babus

customer_reviews.title: Too dark
customer_reviews.text: It is too dark for me, I wish it was lighter. As for blurring imperfections, not really. The only difference I noticed was the shade being darker than the rest of my skin,
customer_reviews.author: Blue

customer_reviews.title: Will become a staple
customer_reviews.text: Works great and a much better value for money and competing products. One star off because it has sort of an odd scent that reminds me of maple syrup!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Brown

customer_reviews.title: Drying
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit smaller than I thought and it clings to my dry patches but it's a good match for my fair light skin and I don't really feel it
customer_reviews.author: Jess Young

customer_reviews.title: Homerun!
customer_reviews.text: This makeup set is worth far more than I paid for it! The cream tube is full sized and is more medium than light but all three products blend perfectly. The powder isn't super light like some of the other reviews mention. I would recommend this product to family and friends!
customer_reviews.author: JHossman

customer_reviews.title: Not for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I usually love anything from physicians formula but this CC cream is not for dry skin, made my skin more dry, the eye cream is fine, very creamy, does crease, the power is also drying
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Rickels

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do much
customer_reviews.text: I'm a huge Physicians Formula fan, so was disappointed that I didn't notice a difference when using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Great 10 in 1 I love it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect color for me, it’s a 10 in 1 foundation. Somewhat light/see through so it doesn’t hide red spots/freckles or anything really well. But I love it
customer_reviews.author: Rachel D

customer_reviews.title: So much darker than I thought that I've had to ...
customer_reviews.text: So much darker than I thought that I've had to use a lighter base to blend. Th compact also arrived completely broken, which means it's now all over my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Christy G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect make-up!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this formula for years. It never fails me. I am very happy, it covers well, lasts all day, even does very well in the heat and humidity, and feels like I have nothing on.
customer_reviews.author: dragongrrrl

customer_reviews.title: Not quite the blurring I expected
customer_reviews.text: Not quite the blurring effects I expected. Doesn’t minimize the redness, dark spots, or pores. Smells nice and feels good all day though.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: had high hopes, was disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: Yet another CC balm that turned my ghostly pale skin orange as well as caused my first zits in years. I had high hopes, le sigh...
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: it is a wonderful make up
customer_reviews.text: it is a wonderful make up...i love this but i ended up giving it to my sister who is a little more fair skinned than i am..i couldnt figure out the shade by buying it online so i went to the store and found it in a tad darker shade....but it really is a wonderful make up..so if you cant decide the shade you may want to buy two ....one that you think and then the next shade darker
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Fairchild

customer_reviews.title: Great packaging
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price price I love the way it is in a tube a plus ill update how it is on my face later
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Chuckluck

customer_reviews.title: Using this product, it depends upon how much damage ...
customer_reviews.text: Using this product, it depends upon how much damage you have to your skin, everyone cannot expect the same results. Make sure the color selected is suited to your skin tone.
customer_reviews.author: w12wills

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product! It smooths out skin color and goes on so light that you can't tell you have it on. I can wear this alone and my face looks clear and even toned. I am sensitive to chemicals, especially under my eyes. This product does not irritate at all. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: The cream works pretty well and matches with my olive-medium tan skin tone
customer_reviews.text: The cream works pretty well and matches with my olive-medium tan skin tone. However, sometimes it does get a little tacky and is hard to smooth onto my skin. The powder is way too light for me, so I don't use it as much. But the concealer is good for my under eye circles. Not great for covering large blemishes though
customer_reviews.author: olivia

customer_reviews.title: Too dark for skin
customer_reviews.text: Too dark for my complexion. But for others it could be great.
customer_reviews.author: Gibby's

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT DEAL! Works great, and easy to blend. Compared to $9.99 to $12.99 each piece that my local drug store charges, this is unbeatable!
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Just like velvet
customer_reviews.text: Covers discoloured skin flawlessly. 2nd tube, found cheaper on Amazon than at the local Walmart
customer_reviews.author: Helly

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product!
customer_reviews.text: Very light. Coverage is great, blends well. Doesn't look or feel like I'm wearing anything.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Jones

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Always bought the BB Foundation, the CC is truly terrific!
customer_reviews.author: Marce H.

customer_reviews.title: Yep, it's ok.
customer_reviews.text: It works to cover age spots, etc. It's just me, but I don't care for the scent of it. It does cover evenly and is easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: sarah subaru

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I’ve reordered it for years now and will continue to do so. Very light weight and does the job :)
customer_reviews.author: Moe

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Product is exact per the description and received within time frame promised.
customer_reviews.author: aaron

customer_reviews.title: a great find, my new favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I love that it really has color correcting properties, it evens out my skin tone, and it doesnt weight much on my skin. great coverage.
customer_reviews.author: M. E.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, Great Coverage
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Very light on application, felt a bit oily but after a few minutes the product soaked in. Resembles a powder finish. Very pleased with the coverage! 10/10 will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these products! Blends with my skin tone really well, and easy to use. Wears well throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Lissa Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought
customer_reviews.text: This was okay and covered okay, but I didn't see that it really evened out my skintone or covered imperfections. And it smells awful. I smelled it for hours after I put it on. Probably won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tavion Phiffer

customer_reviews.title: Amazed all in one!
customer_reviews.text: All in one. Physician Formular is a known brand because they are dermatological products in order to protect you face from allergies. I have always use this brand before but I'm so happy I got this set.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer&MakeUp Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Old makeup
customer_reviews.text: Makeup must be old the eyeshadow barely comes off on brush ..makeup sits horribly on skin eaither to drying or at times oily. Not impressed .
customer_reviews.author: Jenn McKinnish

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: I don't see a difference in using this under foundation or CC cream VS. Using foundation or CC cream alone
customer_reviews.author: TwoOfAKind

customer_reviews.title: The Powder is the Star
customer_reviews.text: The powder is awesome and can totally be worn on it's own. It's not going to make all of the discoloration magically disappear, but it evens everything out really nicely! Bonus points for feeling good on your skin too.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: I've started wearing makeup again
customer_reviews.text: Full-size products, perfect color for my Olive complexion, will order again
customer_reviews.author: d.

customer_reviews.title: Goes on smoothly and doesn't seem to settle into lines and pores and make me look worse (like other products have)
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for a couple of years. Goes on smoothly and doesn't seem to settle into lines and pores and make me look worse (like other products have).
customer_reviews.author: Ronda Powell

customer_reviews.title: Love cc cream but the concealer I received was broke
customer_reviews.text: Love my cc cream and powder but I will twist and twist and twist to get the cc concealer to come out of the top but I have no such luck. I believe I got a faulty cc concealer. Bummed about that.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Harberts

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great amount and works amazing! My skin looks great and you only need a little to work...
customer_reviews.author: Faline pagan

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could get money back fir this oriduct
customer_reviews.text: Worst product Tried to return it Awful smell Cannot get pump to work
customer_reviews.author: Marie puglise

customer_reviews.title: Not greasy, natural, lasts long, nude/beige.
customer_reviews.text: My skin is extreme oily, sometimes combination depending on the weather, also ance prone. I've been using Garnier's medium/deep bb cream and switched to this one since Garnier's bb left a greasy look on my face and left a lot of amount of cream on my phone screen after i use my phone. But with this cc cream, no greasy look, no cream on phone, plus it leaves a very natural look and lasts +8hrs before i have to reapply. If you normally use nude, beige foundation, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Texture was good.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't able to actually use it because the color was wrong but the texture was good.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kaehn

customer_reviews.title: It is lightweight and easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: Okay for the lightest cover and to even skin tone a bit. Have used this before but I think it is no longer a solution for the uneven tones of over 60 skin. May not purchase again. It is lightweight and easy to apply, just don't expect much coverage.
customer_reviews.author: D. L. Horn

customer_reviews.title: I think I look a little younger and my face ...
customer_reviews.text: I think I look a little younger and my face feels fresh. I'm ready for the day when I use this product. I used to buy each item separately but buying them all together saves me a lot of time at the store or online.
customer_reviews.author: Romantic Fool

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great options besides bare minerals and cheaper! Good for daily wear but not for major occasions
customer_reviews.author: Martin Riley

customer_reviews.title: Foundation and concealer have great coverage but aren't heavy
customer_reviews.text: powder arrived broken but I dont' use it that much so no big deal. Foundation and concealer have great coverage but aren't heavy.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: My daughter has sensitive skin and had such a hard ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has sensitive skin and had such a hard time finding makeup she could wear. She loves this stuff! She received some for Christmas and made me buy another, so she doesn't run out. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Great light weight medium coverage!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply and makes skin smooth, soft and even!
customer_reviews.author: dr. jen scarpone

customer_reviews.title: Bummed
customer_reviews.text: The foundation is nice but the concealer is so thin and the powder doesn't look smoothe on the skin. Pretty bummed.
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: Good set!!!
customer_reviews.text: Good set for the money! Not crazy about the little brush that comes with the powder. Would have preferred an applicator but oh well. It does the job and the makeup is covering my dark age spots well, which is why I wanted it!
customer_reviews.author: Marie Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Works well but I wish it would cover redness a little more than it does.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica R

customer_reviews.title: Not that Great
customer_reviews.text: The powder is much lighter than the other 2 and leaves a too powdery finish. The concealer is ok. The CC Cream doesn't have much color correction capability. The range of colors available are extremely limited.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: It was very oily to me. Not a lot of coverage
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Casas

customer_reviews.title: Love my new CC makeup set!!
customer_reviews.text: My CC makeup kit was shipped super fast and the color matches my skin tone perfectly! I only gave it 4 stars because its not full coverage and i have to apply 2 layers everytime, but other than that it covers any redness i may have beautifully and i dont get oily during the day!!
customer_reviews.author: callan

customer_reviews.title: Didnt like it.
customer_reviews.text: This make up made me really orange! The color was off.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlie C.

customer_reviews.title: Very dark/ orange
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not light/ medium more like medium to dark and very orange pigmented. Very disappointed with the color.
customer_reviews.author: KKOC

customer_reviews.title: Kind of oily
customer_reviews.text: I do not like that its oily and doesn’t cover skin tone as well as the cream, which I am used to buying.
customer_reviews.author: GeorginaM

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why it was so dark, but I loved the powder and concealer.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: It's just ok
customer_reviews.text: It's alright. I expected it to have the same coverage as their other Cc cream, but this just feels like a moisturizer to me. A bit disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: I love the concealer and the powder but the foundation is ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the concealer and the powder but the foundation is thick and hard to blend in. Definitely something you want to wear when you are not real close up with anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Just as great as the more expensive brands!
customer_reviews.text: Very light and great coverage! I've tried many other more expensive brands and this is just as good if not better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat this package
customer_reviews.text: Amazing score for these products. The price is amazing. If you like these products get this now!
customer_reviews.author: C.S.G

customer_reviews.title: I had to go over my face with bronzer pretty extreme to regain my natural
customer_reviews.text: While this definitely give you a flawless, lightweight coverage, it is VERY light,,,I am already fairly pale and this washed me out enough, I had to go over my face with bronzer pretty extreme to regain my natural contours
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Family

customer_reviews.title: Great even coverage
customer_reviews.text: I would purchase this over and over again! My only and fav product. It doesnt oxidize like my better beauty brand of products. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Zaki halaoui

customer_reviews.title: Physicians cc cream... Not moist enough
customer_reviews.text: Not as moist as I would like, must use with my moisturizer
customer_reviews.author: Guy

customer_reviews.title: Very medium
customer_reviews.text: The light/medium is more on the medium side. If you are fish belly-pale like me, probably steer clear of this product until the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Product is nice. Pretty orangey/dark for a light complexion
customer_reviews.text: Product is nice. Pretty orangey/dark for a light complexion. Would suggest more of a medium with yellow undertones. Doesn’t blend well on my fair complexted daughter.
customer_reviews.author: bookworm1

customer_reviews.title: I did like the powder
customer_reviews.text: The foundation is too dark for me right now. It might be okay for when I'm tan in the summer. I did like the powder, but it really dried my face out (which was strange, as I normally have somewhat oily skin). I'll continue to use the concealer though, since I've had no problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Selena

customer_reviews.title: Corrects my skin tone
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, especially the powder, which I have been using for several years now!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: More of a primer than foundation
customer_reviews.text: Great for underneath foundation to be used as a primer and SPF. Not the greatest coverage so I wouldn’t call it a foundation. Very odd smell but I still love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Stone

customer_reviews.title: The product is good. The liquid was way too dark for my ...
customer_reviews.text: The product is good. The liquid was way too dark for my skin tone. The pressed powder is wonderful and the right shade. The cc concealer is okay but thin.
customer_reviews.author: CHIGIRL

customer_reviews.title: I expected better. I’m disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I doesn’t conceal dark spots all that well! I expected better. I’m disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela B. A

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: This make-up kit is great for wanting a even complexion.
customer_reviews.author: Adawnreed

product_meta.title: Physicians Formula Super CC Color-Correction + Care CC Cream, Light/Medium, 1 Ounce, SPF 30
product_meta.description: Color:CreamUltra-smoothing multi-tasker can be used as a moisturizer, primer, foundation and SPF protector. Weightless formula instantly blurs imperfections, minimizes the appearance of pores, smoothens skin tone and texture while delivering nourishing benefits. Universal priming CC cream can be worn alone or under makeup as a perfect base for flawless makeup application. High-tech ingredients combined with the perfect combination of 3 color-correcting pigments conceal imperfections to brighten and smooth skin instantly and over time for a flawless complexion: Yellow corrects blue imperfections and warms skin tone; Green tones down redness; Pink brightens and illuminates. Anti-aging brighteners restore a look of radiance and smoothness. SPF 30 protects from UVA/UVB rays, helping to prevent future damage.
feature_bullets: HYDRATE & CORRECT: Our gentle formula helps minimize redness & other imperfections while providing SPF protection & hydration. Apply with fingers, brush, or blender for flawless, cruelty-free beauty.
BEST FACE FORWARD: With primers, highlighters, bronzers, & mineral powders, we have a full line of makeup to help you build a foundation for any look, all made without irritants or harsh additives.
SENSITIVE SKIN CARE: Physician's Formula offers a full line of skin care & makeup for sensitive skin, including mascaras, lipsticks, concealers, eyeshadow palettes, bb creams, bronzers & primers.
HEALTHY BEAUTY: All of our makeup & skincare products are hypoallergenic, safe for sensitive skin & eyes, & made without any of the 150+ known harsh ingredients found in other personal care items.
MULTI-TASKING MAKEUP: With micro color-correcting pigments & high-tech anti-aging ingredients, this CC Cream has the benefits of an anti-aging treatment, moisturizer, foundation & SPF in one product.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
